author: Beverly Sills, operatic soprano
quotes: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don’t try.

author: Steve Wozniak, Co-Founder of Apple
quotes: I learned not to worry so much about the outcome, but to concentrate on the step I was on and to try to do it as perfectly as I could when I was doing it.
